de.hadizadeh.positioning.viewer

Class ViewerMapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hadizadeh.positioning.viewer.ViewerMapFragment

  • public class ViewerMapFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    Fragment for displaying a map for the room model, without lines and without popup information

      • setFollowPosition

        public void setFollowPosition(boolean followPosition)
        Sets the mode if the focus of the map should automatically follow the current position
        Parameters:
        followPosition - true, if the position should be set as focus, else it will not be
